widget.name: Summation of transaction fields
widget.short_description: The widget sums fields with the names specified in the settings
widget.description: The widget sums fields with the names specified in the settings

settings.summand1: Name of the field for the first summand
settings.summand2: Name of the field for the second summand
settings.sum: Name of the field for the sum (will be unavailable for data entry)
